attributes.action: Reduce road congestion substantially by embarking on a new road building programme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Road congestion can be eased if the present motorway and dual carriageway road network is increased in a way that minimises environmental impacts and provides fair compensation to those whose homes and businesses are affected. The network should be doubled in size within ten years.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
